typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		singlecolumn as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> input
input derive({employee name} = substring(singlecolumn,1,8),
		{employee sign} = substring(singlecolumn,9,2),
		{employee organization} = substring(singlecolumn,11,7),
		{employee new sign} = substring(singlecolumn,18,2),
		{employee code} = substring(singlecolumn,20,3)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{employee name},
		{employee sign},
		{employee organization},
		{employee code}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
